pullrequest.title: git_delete_closed_hg_branches.bash: tool for deleted closed hg branches from git repo

content.raw:
Works for me. Also supports local mercurial repos, I tested it like this:

```
simslides$ ../release-tools/jenkins-scripts/tools/git_delete_closed_hg_branches.bash ../simslides-hg/
=========== Start Cloning HG Repository
updating to branch default                                                                                                               
29 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved
=========== Done Cloning HG Repository

=========== Identify Closed HG Branches
remote git branch found: chapulina/readmemd-edited-online-with-bitbucket-1505594411282
Username for 'https://github.com': chapulina
Password for 'https://chapulina@github.com': 
To https://github.com/chapulina/simslides
 - [deleted]         chapulina/readmemd-edited-online-with-bitbucket-1505594411282
```
